content: knitted and felted slippers for baby children women and men in drops snow size 21 - 48 theme christmas ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no ee-287 ----------------------- **sizes** child-child-child-woman woman-woman-woman-man us 4½/6 -7½/9½ -10½/13 -2/4 5/6½ -7½/9 -10/12 -11½/14 eu 21/23 -24/27 -28/31 -32/34 35/37 -38/40 -42/44 -45/48 **materials** drops snow from garnstudio 50 g for all sizes color no 01 off-white 200-250-250-250 300-300-350-350 g color no 14 dark gray or 250-250-250-300 300-300-350-350 gr color no 05 turquoise drops pointed needles size 8 mm / us 11 - or size needed to get 11 sts x 15 row in stockinette st before felting = 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4
